name: Kolacky
author: Diane
ingredients: ¼ cup any flavor fruit jam
directions: Combine margarine and cream cheese in large bowl; beat with mixer at medium speed until smooth and creamy
Combine flour and salt in small bowl; gradually add to margarine mixture, beating until mixture forms soft dough
Divide dough in half; wrap each half in plastic wrap
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Roll out half of dough on lightly floured pastry cloth or board to 1/8 inch thickness
Cut with top of glass or biscuit cutter into 3 inch rounds
Spoon 1/2 teaspoon fruit preserves/jam onto center of each dough circle
Beat egg with water in small bowl; lightly brush onto edges of dough circles
Bring three edges of dough up over fruit; pinch edges together to seal
Place on ungreased cookie sheets; brush with egg mixture
Repeat with remaining dough and fruit
Bake 12 minutes or until golden brown
Let stand on cookie sheets 1 minute
Transfer kolackys to wire rack; cool completely
